00007 #include "mexopencv.hpp"
00008 using namespace std;
00009 using namespace cv;
00010 
00020 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00021                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00022 {
00023     // Argument vector
00024     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00025     
00026     // Check the input format
00027     if (nrhs<3 || (nrhs%2)!=1 || nlhs>4)
00028         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00029     
00030     // Option processing
00031     bool useMask = false;
00032     Mat mask;
00033     Scalar loDiff;
00034     Scalar upDiff;
00035     int connectivity = 4;
00036     bool fixedRange = false;
00037     bool maskOnly = false;
00038     for (int i=3; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00039         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00040         if (key=="Mask") {
00041             useMask = true;
00042             mask = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_8U);
00043         }
00044         else if (key=="LoDiff")
00045             loDiff = rhs[i+1].toScalar();
00046         else if (key=="UpDiff")
00047             upDiff = rhs[i+1].toScalar();
00048         else if (key=="Connectivity") {
00049             connectivity = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00050             if (!(connectivity==4||connectivity==8))
00051                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error",
00052                     "Connectivity must be either 4 or 8");
00053         }
00054         else if (key=="FixedRange")
00055             fixedRange = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00056         else if (key=="MaskOnly")
00057             maskOnly = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00058         else
00059             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00060     }
00061     
00062     // Apply
00063     Mat img(rhs[0].toMat());
00064     Point seed = rhs[1].toPoint();
00065     Scalar newVal = rhs[2].toScalar();
00066     Rect rect;
00067     int flags = connectivity |
00068         ((fixedRange) ? FLOODFILL_FIXED_RANGE : 0) |
00069         ((maskOnly)   ? FLOODFILL_MASK_ONLY   : 0);
00070     int area = 0;
00071     if (useMask) {
00072         area = floodFill(img, mask, seed, newVal, &rect, loDiff, upDiff, flags);
00073         plhs[0] = MxArray(img);
00074         if (nlhs>1)
00075             plhs[1] = MxArray(mask,mxLOGICAL_CLASS);
00076         if (nlhs>2)
00077             plhs[2] = MxArray(rect);
00078         if (nlhs>3)
00079             plhs[3] = MxArray(area);
00080     }
00081     else {
00082         area = floodFill(img, seed, newVal, &rect, loDiff, upDiff, flags);
00083         plhs[0] = MxArray(img);
00084         if (nlhs>1)
00085             plhs[1] = MxArray(rect);
00086         if (nlhs>2)
00087             plhs[2] = MxArray(area);
00088     }
00089 }
